alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:34AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Paulding, central Cobb, northern Douglas and southwestern Fulton Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 833 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Hiram, or near Douglasville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Douglasville, Dallas, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, East Point, Union City, Powder Springs, Fairburn, Austell, Hiram, Lithia Springs, Fair Oaks, Lost Mountain Park, Vinings, Brownsville, Cascade Heights, Due West and Campbellton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton
